laboratory_examinations.findings: Revealed a mixed myopathic and neuropathic motility disorder, with low amplitude contractions and a lack of motor migrating complexes.
Revealed a very similar motility pattern to that of his older brother.
Showed hypertrophy of the muscularis mucosa and lamina propria, mucosal atrophy, and normal ganglion cells in the small and remnant large intestine.
Identified short tandem repeat expansions. Specifics of other findings not detailed.

Performed on paraffin-embedded intestinal tissues from the brothers using specific antibodies against ACTG2, neurofilament, and smooth muscle actin Î±12 (ACTA2). All sections were counterstained with hematoxylin.
